channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- LON-L29D
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- LON-L29D

item.title: CVE-2017-15345|2024-08-05T19:50:16.684Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- lon-l29d
item.description: Huawei Smartphones with software LON-L29DC721B186 have a denial of service vulnerability. An attacker could make an loop exit condition that cannot be reached by sending the crafted 3GPP message. Successful exploit could cause the device to reboot.
